pageProduct.name: Thankyou Botanical Cedarwood Clay Body Scrub 200g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Radiant. Glowy. Silky soft. That’s how you’ll describe your skin after you use this exquisite clay body scrub. We’ve packed it full of green French clay, which has a rep for detoxifying and cleansing the skin, as well as mineral mud from the Dead Sea, which can help to tighten, tone and brighten it back up. Combined with the foresty scent of Cedarwood, this scrub is your skin’s new best friend.

Warnings

But first, read this
Patch test before use. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes (if you get some in there, rinse immediately with water). If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue. To help us make our products the best they can be, we'd love to hear your feedback.

Store product between 5- 28°C. Keep out of direct sunlight or other sources of strong light.
Subtle variations in appearance and texture of this product in no way affect its integrity.

Common Uses

The impossible body scrub
We had an idea: to make remarkable products and commit 100% of our profit to help end global poverty. Some said it was impossible, but because people like you backed it by buying our products, together we’ve helped hundreds of thousands of people around the world. What part does this impossible body scrub play? It helps get safe water or toilets to people in need. 
 
On behalf of all the lives you’re changing, thank you.

Ingredients

Sucrose, Caprylic/ Capric Triglyceride**, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Kaolin, Illite, Montmorillonite (French Clay Minerals), Sodium Chloride, Silt (Dead Sea Mineral), Basil Oil, Cedarwood Oil, Eucalyptus  Leaf Oil, Fragrances (natural), Soybean Oil, Tocopherol, Cetearyl Olivate**, Sorbitan Olivate**, Limonene*, Citronellol*, Linalool*.

Contains 100.0% naturally derived ingredients
**RSPO certified palm-derived ingredients.
*Allergens

Directions

The How-To
1 - Scrub. Wet your skin and massage small handfuls of salt scrub in a circular motion all over your body. Spend a lil more time on marks, bumps and dry areas.

2 - Chill. Wait 2 minutes to let your skin absorbs the natural oils.

3 - Reveal. Rinse with water to reveal your smooth skin.

Use your fave Thankyou Body Wash to help remove excess oils.
